name: UITextPasteItem
desc: The interface for obtaining information about, and interacting with, a text item for pasting or dropping.

items.name: var itemProvider: NSItemProvider
items.desc: The item provider for the item being pasted or dropped.

items.name: var localObject: Any?
items.desc: The custom local object that the copy or drag source optionally attached to the drag item.

items.name: var defaultAttributes: [NSAttributedString.Key : Any]
items.desc: The dictionary of default attributes that the system applies, during pasting or dropping, to plaintext strings from an item provider.

items.name: func setResult(string: String)
items.desc: Sets a text paste item’s textual value to a specified plaintext string from the item provider.

items.name: func setResult(attributedString: NSAttributedString)
items.desc: Sets a text paste item’s textual value to a specified attributed string from the item provider.

items.name: func setResult(attachment: NSTextAttachment)
items.desc: Sets a text paste item’s attachment value to a specified value.

items.name: func setDefaultResult()
items.desc: Sets the text paste item's value to the default value based on the item provider's data.

items.name: func setNoResult()
items.desc: Sets the text paste item’s textual value to not include data from the item provider.
